version_description: Repaired app links for authenticating via selecting a link in an email.
Repaired app links for authenticating via selecting a link in an email.
Repaired app links for authenticating via selecting a link in an email.

- Added @ tagging suggestions in posts and comments
- Fixed following and followers pages to now show all results
- Tweaked the Youtube Video Player
- Bug Fixes.

- Added @ tagging suggestions in posts and comments

- Tweaked the Youtube Video Player

- Added @ tagging suggestions in posts and comments
- Fixed following and followers pages to now show all results
- Tweaked the Youtube Video Player
- Bug Fixes.

- Support for emails with subdomains
- Added copy to clipboard functionality for posts and comments
- Added Support for accessibility font sizes
- Users can remove comments on posts they have created if they do not like the comment
- Tap and hold comments to moderate them if you are the owner of the post
- Comment preview length is now 300 from 100
- Adjusted the Post cells so that during an echo, all actions/information goes and comes from the Parent/Root post
- Image previews for websites now support no image.
- Updated graphics and style
- Adjusted the style of the link preview views
- Paging now works on the following and followers pages so users can view more then 30

We have added a private message feature to the app! You may now directly contact anyone by going to their profiles and selecting the message icon or start a conversation with someone who shares a mutual follow with you directly from the conversations slide-out! Blocked or Muted users will not be able to contact you. Anyone who you do not follow, will be placed in your message requests inbox for approval.

In addition:
- Added a confirmation window for clearing notifications from the notifications page
- We have updated our font!
- Tapping and holding a post will copy
- Small User Interface Tweaks

We have added a private message feature to the app! You may now directly contact anyone by going to their profiles and selecting the message icon or start a conversation with someone who shares a mutual follow with you directly from the conversations slide-out! Blocked or Muted users will not be able to contact you. Anyone who you do not follow, will be placed in your message requests inbox for approval.

In addition:
- Added a confirmation window for clearing notifications from the notifications page
- We have updated our font!
- Tapping and holding a post will copy
- Small User Interface Tweaks

We have added a private message feature to the app! You may now directly contact anyone by going to their profiles and selecting the message icon or start a conversation with someone who shares a mutual follow with you directly from the conversations slide-out! Blocked or Muted users will not be able to contact you. Anyone who you do not follow, will be placed in your message requests inbox for approval.

In addition:

- Giphy now works in the Private Messenger!
- Videos now play in the feed again and we fixed the issue where 1/3 Youtube videos would fail to load

- Optimized image downloads, this should reduce bandwidth usage and improve load speeds with bad network connections
- Added a dark mode setting to respect Apple's dark mode or choose to operate independently. Under accessibility settings
- Added disable video autoplay to the accessibility settings
